mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_person_role (PERSON_ID, ROLE_ID, DEPT_ID) VALUES (#{personId}, #{roleId}, #{deptId})
mapper.select: select tpr.PERSON_ID as personId, tpr.ROLE_ID as roleId from tp_person_role tpr left join tp_person_basicinfo tpb on tpr.PERSON_ID = tpb.PERSON_ID where tpb.ACTIVED = 1 and tpr.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
